dt-api.name: column().name()
dt-api.summary: Get the name for the selected column.

type.description: Get the name that has been set for the selected column (set via `-init columns.name`).
type.returns: The column name, or an empty string if not set.

dt-api.description: This method provides the ability to retrieve the name that has been set via the `-init columns.name` option. This can be useful for the identification of a column, particularly when using orthogonal data, however, it does not functionally change the behaviour of a DataTable.
